The System.description: Reality overlay introduced to Jake's universe, providing status screens, classes, and skills governed by the multiverse.
The System.example: Jake's status screen showing Human (G) level 0 during chapter 2.
The System.notes: Explained by the Introduction Entity during the first tutorial scene.

skill_acquisition.description: When a skill is granted to a being by the System, basic functional knowledge of how to use that skill is intuitively provided. This includes activation mechanisms, general use cases, and passive awareness of effects.
skill_acquisition.applies_to: All races and classes, unless explicitly blocked
skill_acquisition.example: Jake instinctively knew how to activate Archer's Eye and understood what it did upon acquisition.
